content.rendered:
Directed by P.S. Mithran

Written by P.S. Mithran. P.S. Mithran. P.S. Mithran. Pon Parthiban

Cast Sivakarthikeyan (Sakthivel). Abhay Deol (Mahadev). Arjun Sarja (Sathyamoorthy). Kalyani Priyadarshan (Meera). Ivana (Mathi). Shyam Krishnan (Mahadev’s RightHand). Robo Shankar (Inbaraj). Kumaravel (Mathi’s Father). Praveen (Shanmugam-Water Purifier Innovator). Azhagam Perumal (Sakthi’s Father). P.S. Mithran (Fake Certificate Dealer (Special Appearance)) . Abinaya (Murthy Student). Master Adithya (Rough Note Student 5). Agalya (Volunteer). Anand (Murthy Student). Anjana (Karuna’s Daughter). Arasan (Hero Area Photostudio Owner). Master Arsath (Rough Note Student 1). Ayaz (Lover Boy 2). Shoban Babhu (Mrs. College). Babitha (Student). Guna Babu (Problem Teller 4). Jayaraman Babu (Rough Note Parent 1). Siva Balan (Santhosh). Bhagya (Ambulance Driver). Anthony Bhagyaraj (Sakthi Friend). Madhan Chandra (Syllabus Committee). Praveen D.(Water Purifer Innovator). Deepak (Student). Dhayalan (College Seat Person 3). Dilli (Mrs. College Team). Praveen Kumar G.E.(Villain Team). Sanjan Gokul (Sakthi Friend). Gowthamraj (Murthy Student). Gopi Gpr (Police Inspector). HariKrishnan (Rio University Phone Cut). Jereen Ignatious (Teacher (as Sutharshi)). Jawaher.(Mrs. Receptionist). Jeevabharathi (Student). Nalini Jeyaram (Police Commissioner). Madurai Joseph (Police Constable). Beema Kannan (Problem Teller 1). Rishi Kanth (Advocate). Kathir (Lover Boy 1). Kothandam (Hero Area). Ajit Kousy (Judge). Ajith Kumar (Karuna). Prem Kumar (Assistant Commissioner Of Police). Raj Kumar (Police Constable). Kumaramoorthy (College Seat Person 2). Manimegalai (Hero Area Sweeper Lady). Meena (Mrs. Hospital Receptionist). Vikram Savio Moses (Mrs. College Chief). Harrish Mousha (Patent Office Chief). Mullai (Hero Area). Raaghavan Murugan (Junior Sakthi (as Master Raghavan)). Parota Murugesh (Police Head Constable). MuthuKumar (Student). Nagaraj (Mrs. College Principal). Gireesh Nair (Doctor (as Girish Nair)). Sekar Narayanan (Police Inspector). Nishesh (Murthy Student). Chandran Pachamuthu (Hero Area Annachi). Dhileeban Palanivel (Paraglider Innovator). Stills Pandiyan (Hostel Warden). Kayal Perera (Minister). S.R. Divya Pradeepa (Murthy School Teacher). Sai Prasana (Student). Pulipandi (Seat Broker). S. Radhakrishnan (Syllabus Committee). Ashiq Rahman (Problem Teller 5). Nithya Raj (Murthy Student). Pradeep Raj (Teacher). Rajadurai (Police S I). Arandhai Rajagopal (College Seat Person 4). Rajamani (Problem Teller 8). Priyadarshini Rajkumar (Rough Note Parent 2). Aravind Raju (Media Person). ‘Winner’ Ramachandran (Vetriku Vazhi Stall 2). Aswin Rao (Hacker). Sharath Ravi (Hero Area Mechanic). Vignesh Ravi (Mrs. College Team). D. Ravichandran (Problem Teller 3). U. Shreya Reddy (Rough Note Student 4). E. Reka (Problem Teller 9). Subatra Robert (Rough Note Parent 4). Jack Robin (Murthy Student). Saatishkumar (Rio University Phone Cut). Saravanan (Rough Note Parent 3). Sathya (Problem Teller 10). Selvakumar (Problem Teller 7). G. Sengottuvel (Problem Teller 11). Aravind Shankar (Education Broker). Sai Shankar (Patent Office Security). Vignesh Shanmugam (Seat Broker). Sumitra Sharma (Rough Note Student 2). Aadhan Sivakumar (Murthy Student). Soundarya (Mrs. College Student). T. Sriram (Fox Hunting Team). G. Prasana Srivatsan (Murthy Student). Supergood Subramani (Sakthi School HM). Sucil (Rough Note Student 3). Chaplin Sundhar (Water From Air Innovator). Surendar (Murthy Student). Surya (Law College Professor). Suthan (Problem Teller 6). Tamil (Vallara Mathirai Seller). Tamilarasan (Murthy Student). Tharrakrish (Murthy Student). Rahul Thatha (Hero Area). M.A. Vedesh (Sakthi Friend). Velayutham (College Seat Person 1). Velmurugan (Vetriku Vazhi Stall 1). Venkat (Rio University Phone Cut). Swetha Venugopal (Gravity Light Innovator). Vignesh (Patent Office Officer). Pradeep K Vijayan (Rio University Phone Cut). Vijayanandhan (Problem Teller 2). Vishalini (Madhi Mother). Vivek (Lover Boy 3)

Languages Tamil

Producers Kotapadi J. Rajesh

Production KJR Studio
